author: passthenachos
title: Content Wallet for Experiences
description: Consumers disconnected from Creator. Creators removed from downstream impressions and revenue. Wallets are disconnected from DApp ecosystem.
solution: Creators, Brands, and NFT owners use an interactive wallet for the monetization of moments in content with a decentralized design platform.
experience: The founding team holds over 20 US patents, 2 Technical Emmys, 1 Oscar, Multiple exits, existing web 2.0 Series B funded with A list clients
